attributes.action: Make public Transport free in order to reduce congestion,excessive road user taxes are not working
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Run a governmently owned transport system which is free for all passengers. this will significantly reduce congestion and with the money saved from road working, accident call outs, ect, you can fund the new system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
